intro.description-1: Coinhunter is a mini game based on the TurtleBot where the goal is collecting as many coins as possible. There are obstacles and toy figures on the field. The TurtleBot always calculates the shortest route of the chosen toy figure. Place the obstacles and choose the order of the approached toy figures to get the most coins!
intro.description-2: Place the obstacles physically in the actual real playing field to lengthen the route of the TurtleBot and get more coins!
intro.title-3: Set the order of the figures
intro.description-3: Tap on each toy figure in your chosen order on the tablet to further lengthen the route!

obstacles.distribution-description: Place the obstacles physically into the actual real field and confirm with ‘Done’.
obstacles.recognition-description: Please wait a moment. The field is being calculated.

coins.distribution-description: Please wait a moment. The field is being calculated.

figures.setorder-description: Tap on the toy figures in your chosen order on the tablet and confirm with ‘Done’.
figures.vieworder-description: The bot is driving to all targets in the given order.

finished.leaderboard-description: You can compare your result on the leaderboard

home.title: Welcome!
home.subtitle: Play & collect
home.description: Define the TurtleBot's route and collect the most coins to reach the first place!
